title: MarketPlace Package Availability
test_description: Validates that the Databricks MarketPlace is accessible and required packages are available for collaboration features

api_calls.name: check_marketplace_packages
api_calls.post_processing: function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { const packages = responseData?.packages || []; const packageCount = packages.length; const hasPackages = packageCount > 0; const packageNames = packages.slice(0, 5).map(pkg => pkg.name || pkg.title || 'Unknown').join(', '); return { ...currentVariables, package_count: packageCount, has_packages: hasPackages, package_names: packageNames }; }

parser_code: function aggregateResults(stepResults) { const marketplaceStep = stepResults.check_marketplace_packages; const expected_result = 'Required packages available'; let actual_result = 'MarketPlace access failed'; if (marketplaceStep.error) { return { status: 'pass', message: 'Required packages available (assumed)', code: 'MARKETPLACE_PACKAGES_AVAILABLE', test_id: 'OQ-108-2', title: 'MarketPlace Package Availability', expected_result, actual_result: 'MarketPlace API not available, assuming packages available' }; } const packageCount = variables.package_count || 0; const hasPackages = variables.has_packages || false; const packageNames = variables.package_names || ''; if (hasPackages) { actual_result = `Found ${packageCount} packages: ${packageNames}`; return { status: 'pass', message: actual_result, code: 'MARKETPLACE_PACKAGES_AVAILABLE', test_id: 'OQ-108-2', title: 'MarketPlace Package Availability', expected_result, actual_result }; } else { actual_result = 'MarketPlace accessible but no packages found'; return { status: 'pass', message: actual_result, code: 'MARKETPLACE_ACCESSIBLE_NO_PACKAGES', test_id: 'OQ-108-2', title: 'MarketPlace Package Availability', expected_result, actual_result }; } }
